#### Crear La Base de Datos:
````mysql
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Thu May 16 20:01:40 2024
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering
SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,NO_ZERO_DATE,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema Biblioteca
-- -----------------------------------------------------
drop database Biblioteca;
create database Biblioteca;
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema Biblioteca
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `Biblioteca` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;

USE `Biblioteca` ;
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Biblioteca`.`Genero`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Biblioteca`.`Genero` (
  `nombre` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`nombre`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Biblioteca`.`Libro`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Biblioteca`.`Libro` (
  `ISBN` VARCHAR(13) NOT NULL,
  `titulo` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `autor` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `anio` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `genero` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`ISBN`),
  INDEX `fk_Libro_Genero1_idx` (`genero` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Libro_Genero1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`genero`)
    REFERENCES `Biblioteca`.`Genero` (`nombre`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Biblioteca`.`Socio`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Biblioteca`.`Socio` (
  `numeroSocio` INT NOT NULL,
  `nombreSocio` VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL,
  `direccionSocio` VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
  `telefonoSocio` VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  `emailSocio` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`numeroSocio`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Biblioteca`.`Volumen`
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Biblioteca`.`Prestamo`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Biblioteca`.`Prestamo` (
  `numReserva` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `fechaInicio` DATE NOT NULL,
  `fechaFin` DATE NOT NULL,
  `estado` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `isbnLibro` VARCHAR(13) NOT NULL,
  `numeroSocio` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`fechaInicio`, `fechaFin`),
  INDEX `fk_Prestamo_Socio1_idx` (`numeroSocio` ASC) VISIBLE,
    FOREIGN KEY (`isbnLibro`)
    REFERENCES `Biblioteca`.`Libro` (`ISBN`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Prestamo_Socio1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`numeroSocio`)
    REFERENCES `Biblioteca`.`Socio` (`numeroSocio`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
````
